params.amountEXA: The amount of EXA to add liquidity with.

params.keepETH: The amount of ETH to send to `account` (ex: for gas).
params.minEXA: The minimum amount of EXA to receive if msg.value is higher than needed.
params.p: The permit to use for the EXA transfer.

params.inEXA: The amount of EXA to transfer.
params.keepETH: The amount of ETH to send to `account` (ex: for gas).
params.minEXA: The minimum amount of EXA to receive if msg.value is higher than needed.

params.account: The account to deposit the liquidity for.
params.keepETH: The amount of ETH to send to `account` (ex: for gas).
params.minEXA: The minimum amount of EXA to receive.

params.keepETH: The amount of ETH to send to `account` (ex: for gas).
params.minEXA: The minimum amount of EXA to receive if msg.value is higher than needed.
params.p: The permit to use for the EXA claim.

factory().notice: The factory where the fee will be fetched from.

gauge().notice: The gauge used to stake the liquidity pool tokens.

permit2().notice: Permit2 contract to be used to transfer assets from accounts.

previewETH(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of ETH to pair with `amountEXA` to add liquidity.

stakeBalance((address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Wraps `msg.value` ETH, adds liquidity with `p.value` EXA and stakes liquidity on gauge.

stakeBalance(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Wraps `msg.value` ETH, adds liquidity with `p.value` EXA and stakes liquidity on gauge.

stakeETH(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Swaps ~half of `msg.value` ETH for EXA, wraps the rest, adds liquidity and stakes liquidity on gauge.

stakeRewards((address,address[],uint256,.notice: Wraps `msg.value` ETH, adds liquidity with claimed EXA rewards and stakes liquidity on gauge.
